channel.title: How i make pk zone?
channel.description: I'd like to know how to make a pk zone i got all objects in place but i just need to make it pkable :) Join me pkerscap3.no-ip.org

item.title: How i make pk zone?
item.dc:creator: @egyptmo21 egyptmo21
item.description:
@egyptmo21 wrote:

The only real purpose to this is to make an area wilderness.
If you want to add to the wilderness:
Open Client, and find

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {

Where you first see

if ((coordY >=

Right before the (coordY >= Add

absY <= Smallest Y Coord && absY >= Biggest Y Coord && absX >= Biggest X Coord && absX <= Smallest X Coord ||

So that it looks something like

]if (absY <= Smallest Y Coord && absY >= Biggest Y Coord && absX >= Biggest X Coord && absX <= Smallest X Coord) || (coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)

Obviously, you have to make a big old square around your new area. To get the coords, just run around doing ::mypos

And there you have it, some simple tutorials for beginners. It is my hope that the help section will have less topics on anything covered in this tutorial.

Oh and please don’t advertise here advertise in the RS2 Server Advertisement Section

Read full topic
